title: 47th D&AD Awards now open. Enter before Wednesday 18 November 2009 to save 10%
content:
Submitted by [D and AD Awards](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103135305/http:/typophile.com/user/48972 "View user profile.") : 7.Oct.2009 9.57am 

D&AD has celebrated and nurtured outstanding work in design and advertising since 1962. The Yellow Pencil is recognised the world over as a symbol of true creative achievement.

Typophile readers and subscribers are invited to enter their finest type and typography of 2009.

The dedicated jury of type experts look to give awards to original and inspiring ideas that have been exceptionally well executed and are contextually relevant.

Winners are announced at the D&AD Awards Ceremony, published in the D&AD Annual and celebrated online.

To view 2009 winners, the 2010 Awards judges and to enter, visit **http://dandad.org/awards/**

Final deadline Wednesday 27 January 2010

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103135305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/n5551464821_6770_4767.jpg)
author: D and AD Awards
